Test.Name: There in no Access Rules service
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response without Access Rules service

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Access Rules service: NOT SUPPORTED Access Rules subfeatures: NOT SUPPORTED Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Access Rules service (all features supported)
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response with Access Rules service (all features supported) MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPointSupported="true"

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Access Rules service: SUPPORTED Multiple Schedules per Access Point SUPPORTED

Test.Name: Access Rules service (MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPoint not supported)
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response with Access Rules service MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPointSupported="false"

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Access Rules service: SUPPORTED Multiple Schedules per Access Point NOT SUPPORTED

Test.Name: Access Rules service (MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPoint skipped)
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response with Access Rules service MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPointSupported skipped (to chech this option, you need to uncomment corresponding substituion variable in AccessRulesService.asmx)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Access Rules service: SUPPORTED Multiple Schedules per Access Point NOT SUPPORTED
Access Rules service: SUPPORTED Multiple Schedules per Access Point UNDEFINED
Access Rules service: SUPPORTED Multiple Schedules per Access Point UNDEFINED

Test.Name: GetSevices not supported
Test.Description: Advanced Security service: NOT SUPPORETD Advanced Security subfeatures: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope
